sentence.Network_en: Many students are not adequately prepared for higher education.
sentence.Network_cn: 许多学生并未做好接受高等教育的充分准备。

sentence.Network_en: "I think I've covered that business more than adequately," he said gravely.
sentence.Network_cn: “我想我已经把那件事说得够详细了，”他正色说道。

sentence.Network_en: Within this lecture I cannot pretend to deal adequately with dreams.
sentence.Network_cn: 在这一次讲座中，我不敢自诩能对梦境作透彻的分析。

adequate variability 适应变异性adequate variation 适应变异ADH 抗利尿激素
2. adequate responseadequate cause 充分动因adequate sample 适足样本
...on):近端小管中Na+和水的重吸收率总是占肾小球滤过率的65%-70%，称为近端小管的定比重吸收。感受器的适宜刺激（adequate stimulus):是指一种感受器通常只对某种特定形式的刺激最敏感，这种形式的刺激就称为感受器的适宜刺激，感受器的换能作用（transducer function):各种感受器能把作用于它们的各种形式的刺激.

entry.def: If something is adequate, there is enough of it or it is good enough to be used or accepted.

example.ex: One in four people worldwide are without adequate homes...
example.tran: 全世界有1/4的人没有个像样的家。

example.ex: The old methods weren't adequate to meet current needs...
example.tran: 老一套方法已不足以满足当前的需要。

means.word_mean: 2. in an adequate manner or to an adequate degree;

auth_sentence.content: But he added that it has not worked adequately.
auth_sentence.res_content: But he added that it has not worked adequately.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But he added that it has not worked adequately.

auth_sentence.content: Words cannot adequately express our sense of loss.
auth_sentence.res_content: Words cannot adequately express our sense of loss.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Words cannot adequately express our sense of loss.

auth_sentence.content: I would have told him to fund primary care adequately.
auth_sentence.res_content: I would have told him to fund primary care adequately.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I would have told him to fund primary care adequately.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,表示"……的",通常在在名词后.; 2. 表副词,放在形容词后,"……地"

stems_affixes.word_buile: come来+ly……的→翩翩而来→美丽动人的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
stems_affixes.word_buile: cost代价+ly……的→adj.昂贵的,价值高的,豪华的
drizz毛毛雨+ly……的→adj.毛毛雨的[a drizzly day]
friend朋友+ly……的→adj.友好的,友谊的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 很可能的,合适的,可靠的
stems_affixes.word_buile: like像+ly……的→adj.很可能的,合适的,可靠的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 活泼的,活跃的;栩栩如生的,真实的
stems_affixes.word_buile: live活+ly……的→adj.活泼的,活跃的;栩栩如生的,真实的
man男人+ly……的→adj.男子气概的,果断的
niggard小气鬼+ly……的→adj.吝啬的,勉强的
otherworld超世+ly……的→adj.超脱尘世的,超俗的
spindle细长的人[或物]+ly……的→spindly细长的,纤弱的
time时间+ly……的→adj.及时的,适时的
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊
continuous连续的+ly……的→adv.不断地,连续地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 幸福地,愉快地,恰当地,幸亏
stems_affixes.word_buile: happy快乐的,幸福的+ly……的→happily幸福地
active积极的+ly……地→adv.活跃地,积极地
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊
according相符的+ly……地→adv.因此,从而
final最后的+ly……地→adv.最后,终于

stems_affixes.value_cn: 实际上,事实上,竟然,居然,如今
stems_affixes.word_buile: actual[adj.实际的, 真实的, 现行的, 目前的]+ly……地→adv.实际上,事实上,竟然,居然,如今
adequate足够的+ly……地→adv.充分地
consequent作为结果的+ly……地→adv.从而,因此
anxious担忧的+ly……地→adv.忧虑地,不安地
biological[adj.生物学的]+ly……地→adv.生物学上
certain肯定的+ly……地→adv.的确,[口语]当然,行
chief主要的+ly……地→adv.首要,主要地
commercial商业的+ly……地→adv.商业上,通商上

stems_affixes.value_cn: 普遍地,通常地,现在,当前
stems_affixes.word_buile: current当前的,流动的+ly……地→adv.普遍地,通常地,现在,当前
decided确定的+ly……地→adv.果断地,断然地
definite明确的+ly……地→adv.一定地,明确地
easy容易的+ly……地→easily容易地
economical节约的,经济的+ly……地→adv.经济地,经济学地
exact强求,精确的+ly……地→adv.正确地,严密地
exceeding非常的+ly……地→adv.极端地,非常
excessive过分的+ly……地→adv.过分地,非常地
extreme极端的+ly……地→adv.极端地,极其,非常
aggressive侵略的+ly……地→adv. 侵略地,攻势地
financial财政的,金融的+ly……地→adv.财政上,金融上
formal正式的;形式的+ly……地→adv.正式地,形式上
fortunate幸运的+ly……地→adv.幸运地
general总的,大体的+ly……地→adv.一般,通常,一般地
glorious光荣的,显赫的+ly……地→adv.光荣地,辉煌地
great大的+ly……地→adv.大大地,非常
immediate立即的+ly……地→adv.立即,马上,直接地
incidental附带的+ly……地→adv.附带地,顺便提及
increasing渐增的+ly……地→adv.日益,愈加
instant立即的;紧迫的+ly……地→adv.立即地,即刻地
like像+ly……地→有些像的→很可能
logical逻辑的,符合逻辑的+ly……地→adv.论理上,逻辑上
mental精神的+ly……地→adv.精神上,智力上,在内心
moderate中等的,适度的+ly……地→adv.适度地
natural自然的+ly……地→adv.自然地
necessary必要的+ly……地→necessarily必要地
polite有礼貌的+ly……地→adv.客气地,斯文地,优雅地
positive肯定的,积极的+ly……地→adv.断然地;肯定地
preferable更可取的+ly……地→preferably更适宜
present现在+ly……地→adv.目前,不久
probable可能的+ly……地→probably或许,大概
progressive前进的+ly……地→adv.日益增多地
prompt敏捷的+ly……地→adv.敏捷地,迅速地
relative相对的;相关的+ly……地→adv.相关地
repeated重复的+ly表副词→adv.重复地,再三地

stems_affixes.value_cn: 立刻,不久,简略地,简言之,即刻
stems_affixes.word_buile: short短+ly……地→adv.立刻,不久,简略地,简言之,即刻

undoubted无疑的,确实的+ly……地→adv.无庸置疑地,的确地
unfortunate不幸的+ly……地→adv.不幸地
uniform贯的,一致的+ly……地→adv.一律地,均一地
week周+ly……的→adj.每星期的,一周的 adv.每周一次 n.周刊,周报
month月+ly……的→adj.每月的 adv.每月一次,按月 n.月刊

sentences.en: Vitamin B6 must be adequately supplied.
Any room where gas is used must be adequately supplied with air.
sentences.cn: 任何使用煤气的房间都必须有充足的空气。

sentences.en: He had failed to prepare adequately for the task before him.
sentences.cn: 他没有为面临的任务做充分的准备。

sentences.en: Problems arise when the body’s immune system is not functioning adequately.
sentences.cn: 免疫系统不能充分发挥作用时，身体就会出现问题。

sentences.en: I was not adequately insured for the damage my tenants caused.
sentences.cn: 对于房客造成的损坏，我当时没有购买数额充分的保险。

sentences.en: She does the job adequately but she’s not going to set the world on fire!
sentences.cn: 她工作做得不错,但也不会有什么惊人之举!

sentences.en: The committee does not adequately consult others when drafting amendments.
sentences.cn: 委员会在起草修正案时没有充分征求他人的意见。

sentences.en: The product had not been adequately tested before being put on the market.
sentences.cn: 这种产品在投放市场前没有进行充分的检验。

sentences.en: There may be problems if responsibilities are not adequately defined.
sentences.cn: 如果责任没有充分界定，就可能出现问题。

sentences.en: Will the prison system cope adequately with the increasing numbers of prisoners?
sentences.cn: 监狱系统将足以应付日益增多的犯人吗？
